wikipedia.title: Funcrusher Plus
wikipedia.extract: Funcrusher Plus is the debut studio album by American hip hop group Company Flow. It was released on Rawkus Records in 1997. In 2009, it was re-released on Definitive Jux. The album has been recognized as "a landmark independent hip-hop release".

opinions.details: 放克拉什+/ 搞坏专加 (不知道，瞎说）
